prompt: Photorealistic close-up of an antique stoneware crock marking, focusing on a stamped manufacturer's name and capacity number (e.g., '2' for 2 gallons). Dramatic side lighting highlights the texture of the stoneware and the crispness of the stamp. Shallow depth of field, blurring the background to emphasize the marking. The crock is partially obscured by a burlap sack, adding to the antique feel. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: identification-antique-stoneware-crock-markings-image-1.png

prompt: Overhead shot of several antique stoneware crocks of varying sizes, arranged on a weathered wooden table. Each crock displays a different type of cobalt blue decoration (e.g., floral, bird, number). Soft, diffused natural light illuminates the scene. Focus is sharp on the decorations and markings, with a slight blurring towards the edges of the frame. The composition emphasizes the variety and artistry of antique crock markings. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: identification-antique-stoneware-crock-markings-image-2.png

prompt: A craftsman's hand using a magnifying glass to examine a faint, almost illegible maker's mark on the bottom of an antique stoneware crock. The crock is resting on a padded surface. The background is a workshop setting with shelves filled with antique tools and reference books. Warm, tungsten lighting creates a sense of focused study and expertise. The image conveys the challenge of identifying antique crock markings. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: identification-antique-stoneware-crock-markings-image-3.png

prompt: Detailed macro shot of a single cobalt blue brushstroke on an antique stoneware crock. The focus is razor-sharp on the texture of the blue pigment and the subtle imperfections of the stoneware surface. The background is a soft, out-of-focus gradient of gray and white. The lighting is even and diffused, highlighting the beauty and artistry of the hand-painted decoration. The composition emphasizes the details of antique crock markings. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: identification-antique-stoneware-crock-markings-image-4.png

prompt: An antique stoneware crock, partially submerged in water, with a visible crack running through a cobalt blue '5' marking. The setting is a rustic outdoor scene, with dappled sunlight filtering through trees. Leaves and other natural debris are scattered around the crock. The image conveys the age and history of the crock, as well as the fragility of antique stoneware. The composition emphasizes the contrast between the pristine blue marking and the weathered condition of the crock. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: identification-antique-stoneware-crock-markings-image-5.png
